Text:
Anything diferent from this one ?

I have like 3 or 4 different Din's Curse setups that I found on internet ... this is a hard game to make it work 100%

Please remember that after downloading and installing the game you need to go into the game folder and double-click on a file called oalinst.exe which will install OpenAL.


(OPTIONAL)
You can also visit their website: http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/default.aspx

The OpenAl Download page: http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/Downloads/Forms/AllItems.aspx
telling me i need a Demon War Expansion license string to play
OpenAL installer also is not included here
